# Contributing to UNCHAINED

Thank you for your interest in contributing! Please read these guidelines before opening a PR or issue.

## How to Contribute
- Fork the repo and create your branch from `main`.
- Use Conventional Commits (e.g., `feat(dj): add multi-deck hotkeys`).
- Add tests and update documentation as needed.
- Run all tests and ensure the app builds before submitting.
- Open a PR and fill out the PR template.

## Branch Naming
- `feat/<area>` for features
- `fix/<area>` for bug fixes
- `docs/<topic>` for documentation
- `chore/<scope>` for maintenance

## PR Checklist
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Screenshots/demo added if UI
- [ ] Linked to relevant issue (if any)

## Code Style
- Use Prettier and ESLint for formatting
- Prefer functional components and hooks in React
- Use Zustand for state management

## Community
- Join Discussions for Q&A and ideas
- Be respectful and constructive

See `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` for behavior standards.
